About Me

About Me

I am a full-stack web engineer who is passionate about programming, problem-solving, accessibility, and bringing forth my best self every day.

Throughout my career, there have been three themes, community, education, and technology. These pillars led me to LearningFuze, where I studied Full Stack Web Development which aided my growth in the field of programming and coding. While enrolled at LearningFuze, I was immersed in JavaScript, Node.js, React.js, PostgreSQL, and a variety of other languages, libraries, and frameworks. Most importantly, I gained the skills necessary for learning new technologies that will aid in my continual growth as a developer.

Since completing my education at LearningFuze, I have focused on projects that further support my growth and understanding of technologies. I am looking forward to the experiences in developing professional code applications in the near future.
